    • Method Detail

      • tryGcSoftlyReachableObjects

        public static void tryGcSoftlyReachableObjects()
        Try to force VM to collect soft references if possible. This method doesn't guarantee to succeed, and should not be used in the production code. In tests, if you can exactly point to objects you want to GC, use GCWatcher.tracking(objects).tryGc() which is faster and has more chances to succeed.

        Commits / hours of tweaking method code: 13 / 7

      • clearBeanInfoCache

        public static void clearBeanInfoCache()
        Using java beans (e.g. Groovy does it) results in all referenced class infos being cached in ThreadGroupContext. A valid fix would be to hold BeanInfo objects on soft references, but that should be done in JDK. So let's clear this cache manually for now, in clients that are known to create bean infos.
